attributes.action: Healthcare Professionals To Learn NLP and Life Coaching Techniques to Improve Patient`s Care and Recovery
attributes.additional_details:
All health professionals to give empathetic and Person-centred care by learning and implementing improved forms of communication and
people skills.

All Health professionals to learn some Life Coaching and NLP Techniques which have rapid and positive impact on patients and staff wellbeing and are very simple, yet powerful and easy to learn. By implementing them in the NHS saves time and money as patients recover faster, are more happy with care and the staff is under less pressure.

This is achieved by building a bi-directional communication bridge. A coordinated plan to utilise patient`s core motivation strategy for increased wellness. All this can help the patient to recover faster, with greater medical compliance and excellent patient satisfaction during care and after recovery.
